p:
Because sampling bias is frequently present in occurrence records
48 , we removed some of the bias by subsampling records. To reduce the overfit in oversampled areas, we rarefied the observations collected in nearby localities using the gridsampler package
56 in R. We selected only one record for each cell in a grid 0.02 × 0.02 degrees (about 2.2 × 2.2 km). The records utilized in the model dropped from 10,260 to 1252 observations. A preliminary model run with 8884 records (selected by the "remove duplicate presence records" option in Maxent, without any grid sample technique) showed very similar results, in accord with the indication that changing grain size does not severely affect prediction for SDM
57 .
